__e: Calvin is dead because of you .
We don't know where Calvin is.
Ten minutes after we leave Calvin Greene's office, he calls me up and says, "Hey, you got me. How much?"
I'm terrified that my son is gonna turn out to be just like Calvin and just like my father...
As far as he's concerned, murder is just another way to separate himself from the Calvins and Ralphs of the world.
